chat_history.message: Hello, I have the above problem with my product iPhone 13 Pro Max: I used a discount code for my canceled device and now I would like to use it again for this device!! Would you please subtract the 20 euros? Thank you very much for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to deduct the 20 euros at this time, as the customer has already completed the payment. We appreciate your understanding. Kindly ask the customer if they still wish to proceed with this order.

Regards,
JY

Hello, 
My product is iPhone 13 Pro Max has the above problem: 
Please cancel the article
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

Thank you for letting us know. The customer asked to cancel the order. Could you please stop the shipment and issue the refund within 24 hours in order to inform the customer and close the case accordingly? Thank you in advance.

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The order has been successfully cancelled and the customer has been refunded. Please close the case.

Regards,
JY
